abort.issue_ignored: Ignored "{device_name} no longer available". The device and all its entities will still be listed in the regiestry.

init.title: {device_name} no longer available
init.description: The device "{device_name}" is now longer available in your ConnectLife account. If you no longer have this device, you can delete it from Home Assistant.

remove.title: Remove {device_name}
remove.description: The device "{device_name}" and all its entities will be removed from Home Assistant.

development.description: Enable development mode to connect to test server instead of the ConnectLife API.

error.test_server_required: Development mode requires test server URL

set_value.name: Set value
set_value.description: Sets a value for the status. Use with care.
